### Domain & IP Intelligence

*WHOIS, DNS, website analysis*

| Tool | URL | Description |
|------|-----|-------------|
| Whois.com | [https://www.whois.com/](https://www.whois.com/) | Standard WHOIS lookup for domain registration data. |
| Whoisology | [https://whoisology.com/](https://whoisology.com/) | Historical WHOIS data and registrant connections. |
| ViewDNS.info | [https://viewdns.info/](https://viewdns.info/) | A comprehensive suite of DNS and IP tools. |
| SecurityTrails | [https://securitytrails.com/](https://securitytrails.com/) | Extensive current and historical DNS and domain data. |
| SpyOnWeb | [http://spyonweb.com/](http://spyonweb.com/) | Find websites owned by the same person (via AdSense, Google Analytics). |
| crt.sh | [https://crt.sh/](https://crt.sh/) | Search for SSL/TLS certificates issued for a domain to find subdomains. |
| Wigle | [https://wigle.net/](https://wigle.net/) | A global database of wireless networks, searchable by map. |
| Cellidfinder | [https://cellidfinder.com/](https://cellidfinder.com/) | Find coordinates for GSM base stations. |
| IPinfo.io Map | [https://ipinfo.io/map](https://ipinfo.io/map) | Visualize the location of IP addresses on a map. |
| Wayback Machine | [https://archive.org/web/](https://archive.org/web/) | Wayback Machine |
| Web Archives | [https://archive.org/advancedsearch.php](https://archive.org/advancedsearch.php) | Web Archives |
| ISearchFrom - Google | [http://isearchfrom.com/](http://isearchfrom.com/) | ISearchFrom - Google |
| Google Word Sniper | [https://googlewordsniper.eu/](https://googlewordsniper.eu/) | Google Word Sniper |
| DorkGPT | [https://www.dorkgpt.com/](https://www.dorkgpt.com/) | DorkGPT |
